dk.itst.oiosaml.sp.service.util
Class Utils

java.lang.Object
  dk.itst.oiosaml.sp.service.util.Utils

public final class Utils
extends Object

Utility class used for signing SAML documents and verifying the signed documents received from the Login Site

verifySignature

public static boolean verifySignature(String signature,
                                      String queryString,
                                      String firstQueryParameter,
                                      PublicKey publicKey)
Returns:
true if the queryString in the request has been signed correctly by the Login Site

verifySignature

public static boolean verifySignature(byte[] data,
                                      PublicKey key,
                                      byte[] sig)
Check if a SAML HTTP Redirect has been signed by the expected certificate

Parameters:
data - The query parameters in the HTTP Redirect, which has been signed
key - The public key of the certificate from the expected sender
sig - The signature generated by the sender after it has been base64 decoded
Returns:
true, if the signature is valid, otherwise false

getSoapVersion

public static String getSoapVersion(String xml)
Get the SOAP version from an Envelope.

Parameters:
xml - The complete envelope as a String.
Returns:
The SOAP version, represented by the SOAP namespace. Returns null if no namespace was found.
